page.title: 15Credits
page.content: The following are the pupils who took part in the project:Suzanne Bremner, Louise Cumming,Karin Gordon,Morvin Grant,Leigh Innes,Heather Macintyre, Emma Macnicol,Lorraine Macnicol,Yvonne Macrae,Anna Reid,Emma Stewart,Michael Bonner,Alan Campbell,Alexander Clark, Steven Colvin,Paul Cooper,Brian Dickson,Michael Fraser,Ian Harrison, Edward Henderson,Scott Lannon,Nathen Lapsley,Iain Macgruer,Steve Maclean, Richard Miller,George Moodie,Brian Ross,Allan Sutherland,Roderick Sutherland,William Young. Thanks to David Sim,{local {photographer,}Terry Keatinge,{Nature {Conservancy Council.Class teacher,}Mrs E.Allen. Mr C Paul Hagan,compiler and headteacher,Golspie Primary School.
